content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Maria. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. Could you please tell me what you are willing to pay for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 800 Euros per month. Is that acceptable to you?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: I appreciate your offer, Maria. However, I am looking for a higher rental price for this apartment. I believe it is worth more than 800 Euros per month. Would you be willing to consider a higher rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand. I am willing to negotiate. What do you have in mind?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: I am happy to negotiate with you, Maria. I am looking for a rental price of at least 1000 Euros per month for this apartment. I believe it is a fair price based on the location and size of the apartment. However, I am open to discussing a compromise if you have any concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
